message: I'm using the yasnippets default but I'm not happy with them. :(
I was wondering if anyone here knows some good snippets for Emacs, specialy for Ruby/Rails and HTML/CSS
There is something in ELPA, (marmalade-repo.org, specifically) that converts textmate snippets to yasnippets
I'm trying to use zencoding for emacs, any of you ever tried it? I can expand-line but it doesn't show me the preview nor complete the code.
I solved my problem using Max-Arnold's version of zencoding ( https://github.com/max-arnold/zencoding )
